phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
You killed Karen, your owner?
Spirits who kill their masters cannot return to the Spirit World.
I will now start to disappear.
In front of her grave...
But, that is...
It will be all right!
I will yell it out countless times.
I believe your every tomorrow will be shining.
The intersection of all people
Never giving up.
And that is why we are not going to lose!
When it seems like you will be blown away by the headwinds,
grasp this hand, try to take a chance.
Because you are not alone anymore, got it?
Go forward, more and more!
Do not give up on your awesome dream!
That is right, do not cry!
Move on, my way!
Now, with the light shining down upon you.
Do not even think about something like giving up!
Even if you trade being hurt again for strength.
Your eyes, always looking straight ahead,
can surely see the light!
It all started three years ago...
Sorry, I am heading to the spa now.
You be good boys and run home now.
Hey, what about our date today?
What is with her?
She is got another harem?
Ugh.
Oh, Karen my dear, you are back?
If I must...
Gate of the Ram, I open thee!
Aries!
Um...
Did you call me?
I am sorry...
Oh-boy!
She is fluffy and cute!
There she is!
Aries!
Do me a favor and keep them company,'kay?
B-But, I...
I am sorry!
Fine by me.
Let us play, fluffy-wuffy...
I am not a spirit for entertaining men, though...
Are you disobeying my orders, huh?
I am sorry!
Okay, then it is settled!
Let us play, Aries!
Let us go for a drive in my magic wheels!
The Spirit King!
Honestly, when a spirit starts talking back to her master...
What is the world coming to?
Karen, deary...
Do not go treating your spirits so badly.
I am free to use my property as I see fit, are not I?
Little Aries seems like she is suffering.
Like when you used her as a shield to block the opposing wizard's attack...
I am sorry!
Suffering?
Spirits do not have feelings like that.
They are just tools.
Karen!
Spirits are living things, too!
Treat them poorly, and you will be the one suffering next!
Do not bring your petty grievances to the master!
No!
I did not say a thing!
I am sorry...
Making Master Bob angry at me is no laughing matter!
I-I did not...
I am sorry...
Playing innocent, are you?
What are you going to do?
As punishment, I will have you stay in the human world for seven days.
Seven days?
But you do not have that sort of magical power, Madame Karen.
I am sorry!
I would not underestimate me if I were you.
You would do better to worry about yourself.
I wonder what will happen to a Spirit that stays in the human world for seven days?
I am curious...
P-Please stop...
I am sorry.
Running away?
It is no use!
I will call you back as many times as it takes!
You are wrong.
I forcibly switched places with her.
It is you...
Let it go, Karen.
Leo, the Lion.
That is how I was back then.
Aries and I were both bound by contract to Karen.
How dare you open the gate on your own!
I am a spirit designed for battle and quite tough.
I can overlook a bit of mistreatment.
But if you continue to do such horrible things to Aries, I will not forgive you.
And what do you, a spirit, plan to do about it?
I think I should just tell you straight out today...
I want you to release Aries and me from our contracts.
What?
I cannot bear watching your evil actions.
The other spirits fear their keys coming into your possession.
Shut up!
Silence!
You are a disgrace to Celestial Wizards.
Go back!
Gate of the Lion, close!
Close!
Close!
Go back, Leo!
Why cannot I do a forced closure?
Until you release us from your contract, I have no intention of going back.
While I am here, you cannot call any other spirits.
With your magical power, you are not able to call more than one spirit at the same time after all.
That will be quite a problem for you, yes?
I wonder if this will go as you plan?
Your magical power is not infinite, either.
In ten days, my magical power will be used up, and you will be forced to go back to the Spirit World.
No.
I used my own magical power to come here.
Your magical power is irrelevant.
I will stay here no matter how many days it takes.
There are some ruins to the west of town.
If you reconsider, come see me.
How dare he!
Come back, Leo!
Are not you basically at your limit?
The Lion is the leader of the 12 Zodiac Gates.
Things that the other spirits cannot handle, I can.
Until you release us from our contracts, I will not leave the human world.
You have got to be kidding me!
You expect me to give up two of the 12 Zodiac gate keys?
With you, I can earn a whole lot more money!
Go away.
When you feel like releasing us, come back.
Why, you...
Come on...
It is been a month already.
I cannot do any work with you doing this!
I promise...
I will not mistreat Aries any more.
Promise?
You are a liar.
If you really regret what you did, you would let us free.
Damn you!
Go to hell and die!
If you disappear, I can call Aries again!
It is all'because you are here!
This is all your fault, damn you!
I am getting used to being in the Human World.
I cannot really stop my life-force from eroding, but I am not suffering like before.
It is been three months...
Maybe I should forgive Karen now.
If she mistreats Aries again, I can always save her once more.
It cannot be!
She took on a job recklessly without my permission.
She must have been horribly impatient not being able to work for three months.
But Karen should not have been able to call any spirits!
And yet...
A wizard using a large amount of magical power at once
should be able to call forth two spirits at the same time.
Karen was betting on that.
But in the end her body was not able to take it.
All I wanted was for Karen to rethink her actions...
To realize that spirits are not tools...
That we have free will, that we have hearts of our own...
That is all I wanted...
This...
This is not what I wanted!
Karen!
Karen!
That is the sin I committed.
Human life cannot be returned once it is lost.
The dead never return, for eternity.
The only way to repent is for me to disappear myself.
Loke, hey!
I guess it is about time...
Time?
Time for what?
Time for me to disappear...
What are you talking about?
Karen...
Ever since that day, I have been unable to return to the Spirit World.
Y-Your hand...
It is the law of the Spirit World.
The rules.
I cannot do anything about it.
I was never able to forget about Karen since then.
I tried a lot of things to get my mind off it, but I could never forget.
I have simply been persisting until this time came.
Until the moment I disappear in front of Karen's grave.
And, at long last, the time has come.
Thank you, Lucy, for letting me meet a truly wonderful Celestial Wizard in the end...
Wait!
I will save you!
Do not give up!
Give my regards to everyone at Fairy Tail...
No!
Lucy...
I will not accept this!
If you return to the Spirit World, your life-force will recover really quickly!
I will make it so you can return!
You cannot do that...
The law is the law...
But...
This is wrong!
You did not actually kill Karen!
It was just an unfortunate accident!
Lucy...
Gate of the Lion, I open thee!
Return Loke to the Spirit World!
Open!
Please!
Open!
Lucy...
That is enough.
Please stop...
I will not stop!
I cannot stand by when a friend of mine is disappearing before my eyes!
Gate of the Lion, I open thee!
Lucy!
Do not use so much magical power all at once!
I said I am going to save you, no matter what!
I can force open the gate to the Spirit World...
Watch me!
Stop it!
Gate of the Lion, I open thee!
Open!
It will not open!
Spirits who let their contracted owner die cannot go back to the Spirit World!
Please, stop!
You are starting to erode along with me!
At this rate you will disappear when I do!
You will not die!
I will not let you die...
What is the point of magic to begin with if I cannot use it protect my friends?
Stop it!
Do not make my crime any worse than it already is!
What crime?!
If that is the rule of the Spirit World, then I will change it!
What is that?
It cannot be...
That is the...
Why are you here?
The King?
You mean the ruler of the Spirits?
Old friend.
It is forbidden for we who have compacted with humans to kill the one who possesses the key.
It matters not if it was direct or indirect.
Leo the Lion, you are no longer allowed to return to the Spirit World.
Hey, that is going too far!
Do not, Lucy!
Old friend...
Human girl...
That law shall not be changed.
Wait, did he show himself because Lucy blurted out that she would change the rule?
Just for that, the King came himself?
For three years...
Loke's been suffering for three years!
For his friend!
For Aries!
What else could he do?
I too am pained by my old friend's wish...
What are you talking about?
He is not your old friend!
He is your friend, right now, before your eyes!
Listen to me, Mustache Man!
Mustache?
L-Lucy...
This was an unfortunate accident.
Loke did not do anything wrong!
I will not accept anything but his complete innocence!
I will not accept it!
Enough, Lucy...
I do not want anybody to forgive me...
I want to repent for my sins!
I just want to disappear!
You cannot!
You disappearing is not going to bring Karen back!
All it will do is create more sadness!
It is not a crime!
Caring about your friends is not a crime!
This many spirits...
All at once...
Even Karen could not do this...
If you disappear, then Aries, myself, and everyone else here will be filled with sadness!
You will not be repenting for your sins at all that way!
Lucy!
All my friends came forward to show that they feel the same way.
Your friends?
If you are a spirit too, then you should know how Loke and Aries felt!
Lucy, why are you forcing yourself like this?
You want to follow in Karen's footsteps?
If my old friend goes so far as to say that...
Perhaps it is the law that is in error.
Leo, who committed the crime for his brethren Aries.
And you, old friend, who tried to save that Leo...
Considering the beauty of that bond, I will make an exception for this incident.
Leo, I give thee warrant to return to the Spirit World.
You are not so bad, Mustache Man!
You are pardoned.
Be grateful to the star's guidance.
Wait, please...
If you still wish to repent for your sins, I order you to aid your friend and live on.
I believe her to be a friend of such worth.
You should protect her with your life.
You heard the man.
Lucy...
Yeah.
Thank you, Lucy...
A spirit?
You are a spirit, Loke?
Yup, that is the deal.
So that weird feeling when we switched places that time was from that!
Yup, that is what it was.
I did not notice at all!
But wait...
You are not a cow or a horse or nothing.
You know Virgo, Natsu.
She has a human form, remember?
Yeah, but she can turn into a gorilla.
Oh, yeah.
That is true.
Loke's the Lion Spirit.
Lion?!
A grown-up cat!
That is right.
No, it is not!
Cool...
But are you feeling okay?
I am not 100 yet, but I figured I would come to say hi to everyone.
And I wanted to see Lucy again as soon as possible.
He lllikes you!
Stop rolling your tongue!
So let us talk, you and I, about the future!
Hey, now!
Man, I am jealous.
I wish I had a spirit.
What kind of spirit?
A dragon, duh!
Then I could test out my Dragon Slayer magic for real!
Spirits are not things you summon to test your strength!
That is right.
Spirits are for spinning tales of love...
You, go back already...
You are still not fully recovered, right?
Wait a second.
Here!
What are these?
Tickets for a resort hotel.
You guys really helped me out a lot.
Fish!
I have never stayed at a hotel as fancy as that!
I already gave Erza hers, so please have fun.
Hey, people!
What are you standing around for?
Want me to leave you behind?
Now that is fast!
Yeah, let us go!
I will head off just like this!
Me, too!
Idiot, I have to pack for a trip a little, so hold up.
Lucy...
It is not like my sins have completely disappeared,
but you have given me the confidence now to move on.
Where once I was a member of Fairy Tail, now I am your spirit, Lucy.
I will show up whenever my owner's in trouble.
Think of me as your prince on a white horse.
I am not your owner.
I am your friend, right?
That is right.
From now on, let us count on each other, Lucy.
Same to you, Loke!
Lucy, we are leaving.
So, Erza...
If...
If someone here was hurt or lost their life because of me, I think I would suffer a lot like Loke.
But, it is okay.
Because if we all work together, we can overcome any trouble we might have, right?
You could not have said it better.
Yeah!
Hey, let us hurry and go!
Aye, sir!
Let us party all day and night, non-stop!
It is a favor from Loke, so we are going to have lots of fun!
Aye, sir!
There was no way I could have known that before long,
Erza's smile would disappear...
Hey, hey, Natsu!
I am going to head out for a bit!
Upa!
Wow, you are really rarin' to go.
Where are you going?
Aye!
I am going to Heaven on earth!
What are you talking about?
Did you hit your head or something?
You will know if you come with me.
What is with you?
You are creepin' me out...
Next time: Tower of Heaven!
Huh?
A fish restaurant?
This is my paradise!
Happy, do not leave me!
